title: EOD Update
text:

â€¢ Fixed validateDOMNesting(...) error by replacing <p> with <div> and converting HtmlparagraphElement to HtmlDivElement.

â€¢ Converted controlled inputs to uncontrolled by setting default values in PatientRegistration.tsx.

â€¢ Solved the loading issue by adding the scolling logic to AppRouter.tsx and raised the pr.
